content.content: MIP4c3-SP2: MIP62 Amendments  Preamble MIP4c3-SP#: 2 MIP to be amended: MIP62 Author(s): @Patrick_J Contributors: Tags: amendment Status: Accepted Date of Amendment Submission: 2022-03-09 Date of ratification: yyyy-mm-dd Forum URL: https://forum.makerdao.com/t/mip4c3-sp2-mip62-amendments/13779   Specification  Motivation This subproposal amends MIP62c2 and MIP62c3 to reflect the offboarding of the Content Production Core Unit (MKT-001) that occurred with the passage of MIP41c5-SP3 and MIP40c3-SP49. This entails minor changes to a previously accepted MIP that reflect the offboarding of the Content Production Core Unit rather than any substantial change to MIP62—consequently, it is appropriate for an amendment under MIP4c3.  Amended Components  MIP62c2  The following text will be removed from MIP62c2:  "Content Production (MKT-001) publishes the associated notices to:  Official MakerDAO Blogs Owned MakerDAO Twitter Accounts"    MIP62c3  MIP62c3 currently states:  “New communication channels and media assets may be added to those listed under MIP62c2 without the requirement for governance vote by a joint public statement on the MakerDAO Forum to that effect by any two Core Unit facilitators, or by public statement on the MakerDAO Forum by a facilitator of GovComms (COM-001) or Content Production (MKT-001).”  This proposal would remove the reference to Content Production with the new wording as follows:  “New communication channels and media assets may be added to those listed under MIP62c2 without the requirement for governance vote by a joint public statement on the MakerDAO Forum to that effect by any two Core Unit facilitators, or by public statement on the MakerDAO Forum by a facilitator of GovComms (COM-001).”   Amendment Pull Request  PR   Amendment Signal Request Thread  Signal Request   Relevant Information  N/A   @MIP-Editors @PaperImperium
content.GPT-summary: The post is an amendment proposal for MIP62, which aims to reflect the offboarding of the Content Production Core Unit. The proposal suggests minor changes to the previously accepted MIP62, specifically to MIP62c2 and MIP62c3. The post includes relevant information such as the amendment pull request and signal request thread. The author explains the motivation behind the subproposal and tags relevant contributors. A third party is not advertising, collaborating, or giving entirely positive or negative feedback on the proposal, but rather providing constructive criticism and auditing/reviewing the proposal.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is explaining proposal
